Tool

NameProximity Grid
ID26
AuthorO.Conrad (c) 2010
Specificationgrid

Description

Calculates a grid with euclidean distance to feature cells (not no-data cells).

Parameters

NameTypeIdentifierDescriptionConstraints
Input
Features Grid (input)FEATURES
Output
DistanceGrid (output)DISTANCE
Direction (*)Grid (optional output)DIRECTION
Allocation (*)Grid (optional output)ALLOCATION
(*) optional
